# Description

The example [pubsub.config](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/14df3371140bd3d691a89578115cd6cef40efe23/examples/config/pubsub.config?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) is broken. It is currently [disabled from testing](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/src/14df3371140bd3d691a89578115cd6cef40efe23/test/integration/Examples_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Examples_TEST.cc-43:45) in `INTEGRATION_Examples_TEST`; otherwise it causes a seg-fault.

# Steps to reproduce

Apply the following patch, build and run the test, which will only test the `pubsub.config`:

~~~
diff -r 2cf769cc1328 test/integration/Examples_TEST.cc
--- a/test/integration/Examples_TEST.cc	Thu Mar 07 11:14:34 2019 -0800
+++ b/test/integration/Examples_TEST.cc	Thu Mar 07 13:30:12 2019 -0800
@@ -40,9 +40,9 @@
   ignition::common::DirIter endIter;
   for (common::DirIter file(exampleConfigPath); file != endIter; ++file)
   {
-    // TODO(louise) Investigate why TopicEcho crashes on shutdown
-    if ((*file).find("pubsub") != std::string::npos)
-      return;
+    // only test pubsub.config to observe failure
+    if ((*file).find("pubsub") == std::string::npos)
+      continue;
 
     Application app(g_argc, g_argv);
     app.AddPluginPath(std::string(PROJECT_BINARY_PATH) + "/lib");
~~~

**Expected behavior:**  

test passes

**Actual behavior:**

test fails

**Reproduces how often:** 

100% of time

# Versions

1.0.0

diff -r 2cf769cc1328 test/integration/Examples_TEST.cc

   ignition::common::DirIter endIter;
   for (common::DirIter file(exampleConfigPath); file != endIter; ++file)
   {
-    // TODO(louise) Investigate why TopicEcho crashes on shutdown
-    if ((*file).find("pubsub") != std::string::npos)
-      return;
+    // only test pubsub.config to observe failure
+    if ((*file).find("pubsub") == std::string::npos)
+      continue;

     Application app(g_argc, g_argv);
     app.AddPluginPath(std::string(PROJECT_BINARY_PATH) + "/lib");

Expected behavior:

test passes

Actual behavior:

test fails

Reproduces how often:

100% of time

1.0.0
